data.text: Masagiti pɛtɛ, niiti Izilayɛle nuiti ti vɔnini ti ma, Zuludɛn folo ɠulazu ʋelei, ti zei ta-yooiti su, é zo ziɛ wolai Aalanɔn ma, eyɛsu é zeeli Ɠɛɛlɛmɔn gizei ma, folo ɠulazu ʋelei, Zuludɛn ma ʋɛtu nɛmɛi zu.

Ma mɔungi ɠɛni ga Siɠon, Amool nuiti ta-masagi, nii é ɠɛni zeini Ɠɛsɛɓon, ná-masadai zoni Alowɛɛl ma, nii é ziɛ wolai Aalanɔn ma ʋɛtugi laaʋɛ, é zeeli Galaade yooi ɠilazuʋɛ, eyɛsu ziɛ wolai Yaɓɔke ʋɔ bɛ, nii é ɠɛni ga Amɔn nuiti ta-ɠwɛpelemaʋɛ.

Zuludɛn ma ʋɛtu nɛmɛi ɠɛni zea, folo ɠulazu ʋelei, ta ziɛ wolai Zenezalɛte, lɛkpɛmaʋɛ nu ɠɔʋɛzuʋɛ, é zei Kpoloɗɛ Wanai ʋa, Ɓɛte-Yesimɔte ɠobaʋɛ, ta lɛkpɛmaʋɛ nu yeezazuʋɛ, zooi nii é Pizega ɠizei ɠɔɠɔaʋɛ.
Ɓasan nuiti ta-masagi Wɔge, nii é ɠɛni ga Lefa mavofodai ma ɠaaɓelagi ta, é ɠɛni masadai ɠɛɛzu Asatalɔte ta Edeleyi unda.

É ɠɛni masadai ɠɛɛzu Ɠɛɛlɛmɔn gizei ta Saleka ta Ɓasan yooi pɛ unda, eyɛsu é zei Gesuul nuiti ta Maakate nuiti ta-ɠwɛpelemaʋɛ ʋa, ta Galaade ɠilazuʋɛ unda, eyɛsu é zei Ɠɛsɛɓon masagi Siɠon ná-kwɛpelemaʋɛ ʋa.
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-botiɠɛ nui Moize ta Izilayɛle nuiti ti vɔnini naama masa felegɔiti ma. Moize ta-yooi veeni ga tɔnɔ Luɓɛn ná-bolodai ya, ta Gade ná-bolodai, ta Manasé ná-bolodai ɠilazuʋɛ.

Masagiti pɛtɛ, niiti Zozuwe ta Izilayɛle nuiti ti vɔnini ti ma Zuludɛn folo liizu ʋelei, é zo Ɓaale-Gade, Liɓan ʋɛtugi zu, é zeeli Ɠalake gizei ma, nii buzeɠeai Seyiil ʋele. Zozuwe ti veeni Izilayɛle wolodaiti zea ga tɔnɔ, é gaaɠwɛ ti ʋa.

Naama yooiti ti ɠɛni gize yooi, ta ziɛlaʋɛ ma nɛmɛi, ta Zuludɛn ma ʋɛtu nɛmɛi, ta gize wolaiti ma, ta teʋebai zu, ta lɛkpɛmaʋɛ nu yeezazuʋɛ yooi zu. Zooi naati ti ɠɛni ga Ɠɛte nuiti ta-yooiti, ta Amool nuiti, naa ʋɛɛ Kanaan nuiti ta Felɛze nuiti ba, ta Ɠeve nuiti, ta Yeɓuse nuiti.
Masagiti ti pilɛ sɔlɔɔni ti ma, ti ɠɛni ga niiti: Zeliko masagi, Ayi masagi Ɓetɛle ɠobaʋɛ,
Zeluzalɛme masagi, Eɓelɔn masagi,
Yaalemute masagi, Lakise masagi,
Egelon masagi, Gezɛɛl masagi,
Deɓiil masagi, Geedɛɛl masagi,
Ɠɔɔlema masagi, Alade masagi,
Liɓina masagi, Adulame masagi,
Makeda masagi, Ɓetɛle masagi,
Tapua masagi, Ɠefɛɛl masagi,
Afɛke masagi, Lasalon masagi,
Madon masagi, Ɠasɔɔl masagi,
Similon-Melon masagi, Akasafe masagi,
Taanake masagi, Megido masagi,
Kedɛse masagi, Yokeneyame masagi é ɠɛni Kaalamɛle,
Dɔɔl masagi é ɠɛni Dɔɔl yooi zu, Gɔyime masagi é ɠɛni Gilegale ɠobaʋɛ,
Tiilesa masagi. Masagiti tiegɔi ɠɛni ga nu ʋuusaʋagɔ maazu ɠila (31).
